PACKAG 
 IDENT main
SCOLON 
  FUNC 
 IDENT main
LPAREN 
RPAREN 
LBRACE 
 IDENT foo
CASSGN :=
INTLIT 5
SCOLON 
 IDENT foo
CASSGN :=
INTLIT 50
SCOLON 
   VAR 
 IDENT bar
   I32 i32
SCOLON 
   VAR 
 IDENT bar
   F32 f32
SCOLON 
 IDENT panic
LPAREN 
BOOLLT true
 COMMA 
BOOLLT false
 COMMA 
STRLIT must not compile

SCOLON

SCOLON
